body: Marked AndroidAppDeliveryData signature fields properly. Thanks to @Tasssadar

* Method for getting current user's review of a given app added
* Updated device definitions
* Cleaned up Review and UserProfile messages
* Added a rawResponse field to the GooglePlayException
* Instant app link field added

* Named sale related fields in the Offer message, and some others
* BSDiff patch format named (used to be UNKNOWN_3)
* Multiple patch formats can now be requested through delivery method.

* Issue #19 new category list methods implemented
* Wishlist methods implemented

* Issue #18 bulkDetails was broken due to a change on google's side - fixed
* Issue #13 token+gsfId should be enough to build an API wrapper now

* Added a method to get current user profile `userProfile()`
* "Badges" in the details response are recognized now
* Updated most devices

* Restriction constants added
* Device definitions updated
* Compatibility with java 5 improved (required for old androids)

* X-DFE-Device-Checkin-Consistency-Token, X-DFE-Device-Config-Token, X-DFE-Cookie, X-DFE-MCCMNC HTTP headers are now properly retrieved and used. Other HTTP header and parameter usage made closer to the original.
* Beta apps feedback methods added (which are just review methods with special parameters)
* Report abuse method added

* Changed auth token generation process. For some reason the old way of token generation now produces a token with a very limited time to live. This version attempts to fix this.
* TokenDispenserClient now wraps all exceptions in a TokenDispenserException.
* Updated device definitions
* Updated device definitions
* Updated purchase/delivery requests to conform to the latest Google protocol change
* Support for multiple suggestion types in one request

* Early access apps detection
* Beta subscription method
* Device definition updates
* device definitions can now be checked for validity
* Device definition updates

* Reworked iterators again to make them work with all known combinations of the stuff google returns
* Some errors in the device definitions were fixed, device definitions now include vending app version code
* Downloading apk deltas supported
* Support for token dispenser email retrieval

* Added delta apk download options to delivery method
* Reworked app list iterators. This makes working with "cluster..." links easy.
Old authentication method seems to be being phased out. Auth attempts fail randomly now. Will use PasswdEncrypted header instead of Passwd to fix that.

* Updated device definitions with new GSF version code
* Added another Android TV device
* Introduced AuthRepeater to try to counteract random auth failures
Token dispenser client now retries on auth errors. New interesting devices added, old uninteresting devices removed.
Fixed search after google output change. It was returning only one result for popular apps (only facebook app for "facebook" search).

name: Lowering android version requirement
body:
Now compatible with android api>=5 and java>=1.5. For that:
* protobuf dependency patched and included
* okhttp ditched, http client abstratced (look for okhttp client adapter implementation in tests)
* other minor changes due to java version incompatibilities

* .protos extended
* category app iterator added
* search iterator now searches for app bucket, ignoring books, music and so on

- X-DFE-Encoded-Targets header added to make play store return development-stability apps
- category list methods added
uploadDeviceConfig fix

- 2-factor auth detection
- paid apps delivery method
- "similar apps", "users also installed" lists
- reviews add/delete methods

name: Password is no longer needed to initialize the library
